title: Bristol
summary:
Bristol (/ˈbrɪstəl/ (listen)) is a city, ceremonial county and unitary authority in England.[5] Situated on the River Avon, it is bordered by the ceremonial counties of Gloucestershire, to the north; and Somerset, to the south. Bristol is the most populous city in South West England.[6]
The wider Bristol Built-up Area is the eleventh most populous urban area in the United Kingdom.[7]
